body_html: @jbarker-nvidia As for having separate modules for 1D, 2D, 3D, I would follow what we did for upsampling in 0.2: just one module and one functional API (fold and unfold in this case) for all dimensions.
body_text: @jbarker-nvidia As for having separate modules for 1D, 2D, 3D, I would follow what we did for upsampling in 0.2: just one module and one functional API (fold and unfold in this case) for all dimensions.
body: @jbarker-nvidia As for having separate modules for 1D, 2D, 3D, I would follow what we did for upsampling in 0.2: just one module and one functional API (fold and unfold in this case) for all dimensions.
